title: ParameterRedefSet

name.description: The name of the parameter set.

description.description: A description of the parameter set.

isBaseline.description: Indicates if this set of parameter redefinitions is the baseline for a product system.

parameters.description: The parameter redefinitions of this redefinition set.

description: An instance of this class is just a set of parameter redefinitions attached to a product system. It can have a name and a description. One of the parameter sets can be defined as the baseline of the product system. In the calculation the baseline set is then taken by default.
